ComicInfo.Summary:
Paul Sanders, a former Olympic level swimming champion decided to show off to two female reporters from 'Women's Lib' magazine by swimming the distance to his father's oil rig however as he approaches the rig they drill unleashes a strange bacteria into the water which he absorbs and sinks under the surface.
Rescued by the reporters Paul changes into a Man-Monster and collapses; stuck under a hot shower by the reporters (who presumably got a great story from this) Paul reverted to Human. He later transformed back when the villainous Hellblazer tried to bring Paul into one of his schemes, but failing shot Paul with a laser gun trigging both Paul's transformation and a huge fire.Â
Saving one of the reporters Man-Monster Paul brings her to safety only to be surrounded by cops - accompanied by his father - who are ordered to Fire!
As this was the last book in this series we never found out anything more; there was a solicitation for a 'Man-Monster' comic that never appeared..
